page.title: 01CHEDDAR GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: { {Cheddar}is a large and pretty village at the foot of the{Mendips.}It has a population of about 4000 who live here permanently but a lot more in the summer when lots of{tourists}visit the village to look at the{gorge,}the {caves}and the{hills,}and other{places {of interest.}Cheddar is famous for { {cheese,strawberries and cream.}Many people work in the{tourist industry, {quarrying}and in{horticulture,}mainly strawberry growing.There are three schools,First,Middle and Upper School, lots of shops and six churches.There are three caravan sites,a Youth Hostel and several hotels,cafes and guest houses.We think it is a lovely place to live because it has everything we need,lots of things to see and lots of things to do.
